name: Acid Sewers
description:
CLICK HERE FOR THE ONLINE VERSION: https://spoonsweet.itch.io/acid-sewers-online

thanks to Crayon <3.

EDIT: you would have won by reaching the white bricks, where the gears end, seems it doesn't load properly, a big mess. 

Move around with arrow keys, space to jump and listen to-

R if you get stuck ( I think I still left that in while testing)

Made for GDKO2023 round 3. The theme was the boss fight!

Game made with Godot and Asesprite.

Come say hi!
